locations.title: San Fransisco
locations.description: Medill’s San Francisco campus will open in summer 2016 along with Northwestern’s McCormick School of Engineering and Applied Science. The new campus will further enhance the school’s leadership at the intersection of engineering, computer science, journalism and integrated marketing communications.
